workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.0819433419320349 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.2855655931052552 --weight-decay 6.031661663168741e-05 --lr 0.00012301701220115502 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 137720 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.11352023311374093 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
